author: per curiam
text:
551 U. S. ____ (2007)551 U. S. ____ (2007)551 U. S. ____ (2007)SUPREME COURT OF THE UNITED STATESMARIO CLAIBORNE, PETITIONERv.UNITED
STATESon writ of certiorari to the united states court of
appeals for the eighth circuit[June 4, 2007]Per Curiam.The Court is advised that the
petitioner died in St. Louis, Missouri, on May 30, 2007. The
judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth
Circuit is therefore vacated as moot. SeeUnited Statesv.Munsingwear, Inc.,340 U. S. 36(1950).It is so ordered.
